channel.title: NDTV News Search Records Found 1000
channel.description: NDTV.com provides the latest information from and in-depth coverage of India and the world. Find breaking news, India news, top stories, elections, politics, business, cricket, movies, lifestyle, health, live TV, videos, photos and more.

item.title: Iran Attacks US Base In Qatar's Doha With Missiles In Retaliation
item.description: Iran on Monday fired missiles aimed at an American base in Qatar, the largest strategic asset of the US army in the West Asia region, in retaliation to the attack on its nuclear sites over the weekend.
item.content:encoded: <iframe title="Player" class="head-story__img img__full lazyload" height="300" scrolling=no frameborder=no src="about:blank" data-src="https://www.ndtv.com/video/embed-player/id/956548/play-via-app-wap?pWidth=100&pHeight=100&embed_type=story&site=classic&autostart=1"> </iframe>Iran on Monday fired missiles aimed at an American base in Qatar, the largest strategic asset of the US army in the West Asia region, in retaliation to the attack on its nuclear sites over the weekend.

item.title: "12 Day War Ends": Trump Announces Israel-Iran Ceasefire

media:content.media:description: Trump announced a "complete and total" ceasefire between Israel and Iran.

item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday that a "complete and total" ceasefire between Israel and Iran will go into force with a view to ending the conflict between the two nations.
item.content:encoded: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday that a "complete and total" ceasefire between Israel and Iran will go into force with a view to ending the conflict between the two nations.

item.title: "Thank You For Giving Early Notice": Trump After Iran Targets US Air Base
item.description: US President Donald Trump signalled today that Iran's attempted air strike at the US-run Al Udeid air base in Qatar would not draw a retaliation from Washington.
item.content:encoded: US President Donald Trump signalled today that Iran's attempted air strike at the US-run Al Udeid air base in Qatar would not draw a retaliation from Washington.

item.title: JD Vance Says Iran Is Now "Incapable" Of Building Nuclear Weapon

media:content.media:description: JD Vance said that Iran is incapable of building a nuclear weapon.

item.description: U.S. Vice President JD Vance said on Monday Iran was no longer able to build a nuclear weapon after U.S. strikes destroyed its infrastructure.
item.content:encoded: U.S. Vice President JD Vance said on Monday Iran was no longer able to build a nuclear weapon after U.S. strikes destroyed its infrastructure.

item.title: Trump Brokered Ceasefire Agreement In Contact With Israel, Iran: White House

media:content.media:description: Trump announced a "complete and total" ceasefire between Israel and Iran.

item.description: President Donald Trump brokered a ceasefire agreement between Israel and Iran on Monday in a call to Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and with Trump's team in contact with Iranian officials, a senior White House official said.
item.content:encoded: President Donald Trump brokered a ceasefire agreement between Israel and Iran on Monday in a call to Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and with Trump's team in contact with Iranian officials, a senior White House official said.

item.title: Trump Says He Expects Israel-Iran Ceasefire To Last Forever
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump told NBC News he expects an Israel-Iran ceasefire that he announced on Monday to last "forever."
item.content:encoded: U.S. President Donald Trump told NBC News he expects an Israel-Iran ceasefire that he announced on Monday to last "forever."

item.title: US Supreme Court Allows Trump To Resume Deportations To Third Countries

media:content.media:description: Trump campaigned for president promising to expel millions of undocumented migrants from the US.

item.description: A divided US Supreme Court paved the way on Monday for the Trump administration to resume deportations of undocumented migrants to countries that are not their own.
item.content:encoded: A divided US Supreme Court paved the way on Monday for the Trump administration to resume deportations of undocumented migrants to countries that are not their own.

item.title: UK PM Says Britain Commits To NATO 5% Spending Target

media:content.media:description: UK PM Monday said Britain was committed to spending 5 percent of its economic output on defence.

item.description: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer announced Monday that Britain was committed to spending five percent of its economic output on defence, in line with a pledge set to be announced by NATO at a summit in the Netherlands.
item.content:encoded: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer announced Monday that Britain was committed to spending five percent of its economic output on defence, in line with a pledge set to be announced by NATO at a summit in the Netherlands.

item.title: "Will Respond Again In Case...": Iran Warns US After Attack On Qatar Base
item.description: Iran's Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi said on Monday that Tehran's attack on U.S military base al-Udeid in Qatar came in response to the U.S. "aggression against Iran's territorial integrity and sovereignty."
item.content:encoded: Iran's Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi said on Monday that Tehran's attack on U.S military base al-Udeid in Qatar came in response to the U.S. "aggression against Iran's territorial integrity and sovereignty."

item.title: Iran Attacks US Air Base: What We Know So Far

media:content.media:description: Qatar saidits air defences had intercepted missiles directed at the airbase.

item.description: Iran launched missiles toward America's Al-Udeid base in Qatar today in response to the US strikes on the nuclear facilities of Tehran. The Iranian Armed Forces said the base was targeted with a powerful missile attack in Operation Beshararat Fatah.
item.content:encoded: <iframe title="Player" class="head-story__img img__full lazyload" height="300" scrolling=no frameborder=no src="about:blank" data-src="https://www.ndtv.com/video/embed-player/id/956548/play-via-app-wap?pWidth=100&pHeight=100&embed_type=story&site=classic&autostart=1"> </iframe>Iran launched missiles toward America's Al-Udeid base in Qatar today in response to the US strikes on the nuclear facilities of Tehran. The Iranian Armed Forces said the base was targeted with a powerful missile attack in Operation Beshararat Fatah.

item.title: Israel-Iran War LIVE Updates: "14 Missiles Fired, 13 Knocked Down, 1 Set Free": Trump On Iran's Attack

media:content.media:description: Israel-Iran War LIVE: Iran bombed US air bases in Qatar today in retaliation.

item.description: US-Israel-Iran Conflict LIVE Updates: The United States carried out a "very successful attack" on three nuclear sites in Iran, President Donald Trump said.
item.content:encoded: US-Israel-Iran Conflict LIVE Updates: The United States carried out a "very successful attack" on three nuclear sites in Iran, President Donald Trump said.

item.title: Iran Considers Suspending Cooperation With Nuclear Watchdog IAEA
item.description: Tehran is considering suspending its cooperation with the International Atomic Energy Agency, the speaker of Iran's parliament said Monday.
item.content:encoded: Tehran is considering suspending its cooperation with the International Atomic Energy Agency, the speaker of Iran's parliament said Monday.

item.title: Kuwait, Iraq, UAE, Bahrain, Qatar Shut Airspace As Iran Attacks US Air Base
item.description: Airlines were on fresh alert late on Monday after Qatar, Bahrain, UAE, Iraq, and Kuwait closed their countries' airspace temporarily as Iran attacked the Al Udeid US military base in Doha, the latest upheaval to air travel in the Middle East.
item.content:encoded: Airlines were on fresh alert late on Monday after Qatar, Bahrain, UAE, Iraq, and Kuwait closed their countries' airspace temporarily as Iran attacked the Al Udeid US military base in Doha, the latest upheaval to air travel in the Middle East.

item.title: Multiple Global Airlines Disrupted As Middle East Tensions Rise

media:content.media:description: Global airlines have suspended or reduced flights in the Middle East due to Iran-Israel conflict.

item.description: Global airlines have suspended or reduced flights in the Middle East as the conflict between Israel and Iran rages after the United States bombed three Iranian nuclear enrichment sites at the weekend.
item.content:encoded: Global airlines have suspended or reduced flights in the Middle East as the conflict between Israel and Iran rages after the United States bombed three Iranian nuclear enrichment sites at the weekend.

item.title: Iran Threat "To Whole World", Says Israel After US Base Attacked In Qatar

media:content.media:description: Traces are seen in the sky after Iran targeted the Al-Udeid base in a missile attack in Qatar.

item.description: The Israeli military said Monday that Iran's retaliatory attack on US military bases proved that the country was a threat to "the entire world".
item.content:encoded: The Israeli military said Monday that Iran's retaliatory attack on US military bases proved that the country was a threat to "the entire world".

item.title: "Irrelevant", Says Marco Rubio On Whether Iran Was Building Nuclear Weapon

media:content.media:description: On Sunday, the US dropped 14,000-kg bunker-buster bombs on Iran's key nuclear sites.

item.description: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio has defended President Donald Trump's decision to target Iran's three nuclear facilities despite intelligence and the International Atomic Energy Agency assessment that Tehran was in no position to have weapons.
item.content:encoded: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio has defended President Donald Trump's decision to target Iran's three nuclear facilities despite intelligence and the International Atomic Energy Agency assessment that Tehran was in no position to have weapons.

item.title: No Casualties Reported In Iran Missile Attack On US Base In Qatar

media:content.media:description: There was no impact on the U.S. Al Udeid airbase in Qatar, the official said.

item.description: There was no Iranian attack detected at any U.S. military base other than in Qatar, a U.S. military official told Reuters on Monday.
item.content:encoded: There was no Iranian attack detected at any U.S. military base other than in Qatar, a U.S. military official told Reuters on Monday.

item.title: WhatsApp Banned On US House Of Representatives Devices: Memo

media:content.media:description: WhatsApp messaging service has been banned on all US House of Representatives devices

item.description: Meta Platforms' WhatsApp messaging service has been banned on all US House of Representatives devices, according to a memo sent to House staff on Monday.
item.content:encoded: Meta Platforms' WhatsApp messaging service has been banned on all US House of Representatives devices, according to a memo sent to House staff on Monday.

item.title: 'Remain Calm': Centre To 7.45 Lakh Indians As Iran Missiles Hit Qatar
item.description: Nearly eight lakh Indians live in Qatar, sources in the External Affairs Ministry told NDTV late Monday, shortly after Iran fired ballistic missiles at a US Air Force base in that country.
item.content:encoded: Nearly eight lakh Indians live in Qatar, sources in the External Affairs Ministry told NDTV late Monday, shortly after Iran fired ballistic missiles at a US Air Force base in that country.

item.title: Iran Releases Video Claiming Hit On US' Al Udeid Base In Qatar

media:content.media:description: The type of missile used by Iran in the strike is still unknown.

item.description: A video, reportedly released by Iran, shows the moment Tehran launched a missile to strike a US air base in neighbouring Qatar in response to the American strikes on its nuclear facilities.
item.content:encoded: <iframe title="Player" class="head-story__img img__full lazyload" height="300" scrolling=no frameborder=no src="about:blank" data-src="https://www.ndtv.com/video/embed-player/id/956535/play-via-app-wap?pWidth=100&pHeight=100&embed_type=story&site=classic&autostart=1"> </iframe>A video, reportedly released by Iran, shows the moment Tehran launched a missile to strike a US air base in neighbouring Qatar in response to the American strikes on its nuclear facilities.
